original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1306)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(491)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並強化全體我方武將 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4732)@</color> 點武力智力，以及 <color=#ccffcc>22%</color> 爆擊率爆擊傷害，同時解除大部分異常狀態。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1306)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(491)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy in the front range, and strengthens all our generals <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4732)@</color> Point of military intelligence, and <color=# ccffcc>22%</color> Critical strike rate Critical strike damage, while removing most abnormal states.
